The Birthday Songs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): FAQ (Required Reading!): The Birthday Songs
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, July 15, 2001 - 08:53 pm:

Each time your monster gets to be 48 weeks old, (up to 12 years of age) it will have a birthday. Holly will say, "Today is (monster's name) (1st, 2nd, etc.) Birthday Let's sing a song." The following is a list of what happens next in each year:

1) "Happy Birthday to (monster name) GET BIGGER!"
he seems happy.

2) "Happy Birthday to (monster name) GET STRONGER!"
he seems very happy.

4) "Happy Birthday to (monster name) TRY YOUR BEST!"
he seems very happy. (monster name) wishes you the best of luck.

5) "Happy Birthday to (monster name) KEEP IT UP!"
he seems very happy. (monster name) wishes you the best of luck.

6) "Happy Birthday to (monster name) You can still continue on!"
He seems very happy. He is turned 6 already.

7) "Happy Birthday to (monster name) You can still continue on!"
......I hope he can still go on after 7 years.

8) This year I'll sing for him by myself. "Happy Birthday dear (monster name) Happy Birthday to you. Good Luck!"
......8 years old already... But you're still looking great.

9) "Happy Birthday dear (monster name) Happy Birthday to you. Good Luck!"
......9 years old you've lived long

10) "Happy Birthday dear (monster name) Happy Birthday to you." Good Luck!
......10 years and you're still in good shape.

11) "Happy Birthday dear (monster name) Happy Birthday to you." Good Luck!
......After 11 years you still look good

12) No mention of the birthday at all, this year and thereafter.
